controlled_vocabulary.comment: This table supplies the restricted vocabulary for the column major category in the table Experimental Factor and describes those variables in the experiment not considered to be the treatment
The elements of this controlled vocabulary are encoded in the curation tool. They are not currently implemented but are likely to be soon.

term.name: methodological_factor
term.description: variations in the methods and procedures used to prepare reagents like RNA and cDNA

term.name: biological_factor
term.description: variations in the way an organism was treated, such as environmental stress like heat shock and cold shock
